learning_objectives: Understand the fundamentals of CAP Theorem
Apply CAP Theorem in practical scenarios
sections.background: A distributed system cannot meet 3 requirements of Consistency, Availability, and Partition tolerance at the same time. At most, only two of them can be satisfied at the same time.

metadata.concept_definition: A distributed system cannot meet 3 requirements of Consistency, Availability, and Partition tolerance at the same time. At most, only two of them can be satisfied at the same time.
